description:
I want to find a real woman who knows what she wants and is tired of all the bullshit. I want to try something different and just be friends with someone before things get serious.

I promise I am different from the rest of these clowns on here. I'll be honest I was in prison for five years I just got out three months ago, but I have a good job. I don't have a car, but I have my own crib. I am kinda old fashioned and a gentleman, but I can lay the pipe if you're with me you won't ever be bored.
